Reviews.Title: “THEFT ALERT! DO NOT STAY HERE”
Reviews.Author: udon_indigo
Reviews.Content: family 4 checked hotel sunset roma 4 nights suite l1 day arrival confusion booking avaliable counter rarely counter stay stand lobby 30 minutes sort beginning hotel broken night stay lost 2 laptops cash wallets 2000 passport fishy doors windows broken hotel electronic access cards 3 cards avaliable 2 owner requested camera video denied owner andrea claimed footage stored company authorized reported local police told video avaliable camera broken awhile happen andrea informed hotel booked couple days own eventhough hotel eventhough money passport own details happened afterwards worst experience ive completely ruined family memory rome avoid hotel cost stay
